body_html:
Ugh, this is not really the way we do this, but I guess it's consistent with usage. FTR, normally we don't include the same file in two different rules. Typically, only a single rule includes a file. For instance, :dtypes appears to be a rule that's "logical" for compatibility.h. So, you would depend on that library.

(note the edit)

body:
Ugh, this is not really the way we do this, but I guess it's consistent with usage. FTR, normally we don't include the same file in two different rules. Typically, only a single rule includes a file. For instance, `:dtypes` appears to be a rule that's "logical" for `compatibility.h`. So, you would depend on that library.

(note the edit)
